solution_line_template: His hair grew {current_length} inches - {initial_length} inches = <<{current_length}-{initial_length}={total_growth}>>{total_growth} inches
Hair grows at a rate of {months_per_year} months/year * {monthly_growth_rate} inches/month =<<{months_per_year}*{monthly_growth_rate}={annual_growth_rate}>>{annual_growth_rate} inches/year
It took him {total_growth} inches / {annual_growth_rate} inches/year = <<{total_growth}/{annual_growth_rate}={time_in_years}>>{time_in_years} years to grow his hair out.
